data.text: Ezɨ Suhan kantrin gumazim Bildat kamaghɨn Jopɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨam ikarvasi:
“Jop, nɨ dazoghɨn uan akam dukuagham?
Nɨ manmaghsua kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi,
Nɨn anɨngagharim nɨrara nɨ gasɨghasɨsi.
Gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba, God me gasɨghasɨsi.
Eghtɨ gumazamiziba ua lamɨn angazangarimɨn gantɨ,
Gumazamizir kaba deravɨra itir dughiamɨn me pamten arui,
Me mati asɨziba aruima iver ekiam dar suisi,
Me mati asɨziba azuazimɨn aven zui,
egha me mati asɨziba benibar dui,
Bizir atiatir ekiam me ganɨdiba,
“Arazir kurabagh amir gumazamiziba,
Gumazamizir kurar kaba, arɨmariar bar kuratam men mɨkarzibar otiv,
Me ghaze, men dɨpeniba ti men ikɨrɨmɨrim damutɨ, a bar deragham.
Me oveghtɨ, gɨn men ikɨzimɨn aven tav ua ikɨ,
Gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba bar gɨvagham,
Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar me gɨn amadagham.
Me angamɨra itir dughiamɨn, me aruemɨn angazangarimɨn gari.
Men ikɨzim bar kuavaremegham,
Aruem anadi naghɨn itir gumazamiziba ko, aruem ghuaghiri naghɨn itir gumazamiziba,
Osɨmtɨzir guar avɨrir kaba, gumazir kurar nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir puvatɨzibar amuiroghboriba ko,
